method.name: create
method.description: Creates a new text file. This function has access control, and it can be executed only from the SDK.

parameter.name: $recursive
parameter.description: Indicates whether the file will create the path's folders if don't exist. It is TRUE by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: remove
method.description: Remove a file. This function has access control, and it can be executed only from the SDK.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: get
method.description: Returns the contents of a given file.
method.returndescription: The file contents or NULL if the file does not exist.

method.name: put
method.description: Puts contents to the given file. This function has access control, and it can be executed only from the SDK.

parameter.name: $flags
parameter.description: The value of flags can be any combination of the file_put_contents flags, joined with the binary OR (|) operator.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: copy
method.description: Copies a file. This function has access control, and it can be executed only from the SDK.

parameter.name: $preventOverwrite
parameter.description: If set to TRUE the destination file will not be overwritten. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: move
method.description: Moves a file. This function has access control, and it can be executed only from the SDK.

parameter.name: $preventOverwrite
parameter.description: If set to TRUE the destination file will not be overwritten. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getSize
method.description: Returns the size of a file, or FALSE in case of an error.

parameter.name: $formated
parameter.description: If set to TRUE, then the size will be formatted. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: The file size, formated [not in bytes] or not [in bytes], or FALSE in case of an error.

method.name: validateName
method.description: Check if the given name contains one of the following characters and thus it is not valid Char list: \ / ? % * : | " < >
method.returndescription: TRUE if the name is valid FALSE if it is invalid

method.name: formatBytes
method.description: Takes and formats a size in bytes.

parameter.name: $precision
parameter.description: The precision of the rounded sizes in digits.

method.returndescription: The size formated in the highest value possible.
